<title level="1" right="Action">[Absorb into the Aegis](/Actions.aspx?ID=321) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** An enemy casts a spell that targets you or an ally within 15 feet of you

</column>

---

You interpose your shield’s ward against the spell. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=299) check, using your Religion modifier as your counteract modifier. On a success, the spell is counteracted and your shield takes damage equal to four times the spell level as it absorbs and disperses the magical energy. On a failure, the shield takes damage equal to twice the spell’s level.
name: Absorb into the Aegis
